jp: アドミラル・シェーア
lb:
Reduces [Main Battery] CD by 4 seconds.
Free Spirit upgraded to Level 2.
During [Main Battery Salvo], adds a chance to activate [Cut-in].

Increases [Main Battery Salvo] damage by 20%.
Free Spirit upgraded to Level 3.

When [Secondary Battery] is firing, firing a [Main Battery Salvo] will deal 200% more damage, will assume T-Adv for damage. Can only proc once per battle.
Free Spirit upgraded to Level 4.

traits.name: Free Spirit
traits.text: Increase Workshop and Bar production by 2%/3%/4%/5%

skills.name: Class Skill
skills.text:
Can attack from medium range, reload time: 12s
Can launch torpedoes from medium range; another torpedo cannot be fired unless an already launched torpedo has hit the enemy/expired

skills.name:
Survivor's Will
生き残りの意地
skills.text: 1. On [Main Battery hit] 50% chance to set enemies on [Fire]. [Fire] dealing 110% of Firepower over 10 seconds.2. On [Main Battery hit] 100% chance to inflict [Inhibited], preventing the target from repairing for 10 seconds.

skills.name:
Oversized Main Battery
规格外の主炮
skills.text: 1. Can fire [Main Battery] at Long Range.2. Damage increased by 20%.

comment: A mysteriously classy lady. Finds joy in giving others pain. Is good at planning, and prefers to control things from behind the scenes. Enjoys bullying her sister Deutschland.
